original_title: Shooting in Dikwella injures one person
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); One person was injured in a shooting that took place down Kumaratunga Mawatha in Dematapitiya, Dikwella.
Sri Lanka Police said that a man travelling on a motorcycle was injured in the shooting that was carried out by two men who had arrived in a car and later fled the scene.
The injured man was admitted to the Matara Hospital, and a police investigation is underway to arrest the suspects.
Broadcasting Regulatory Act still in draft stage, and will not be used to suppress the media – Bandula
No election in 2023, and election will be held when economy is stable – Bandula
